actions.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to ensure meaningful access to individuals with limited English proficiency to the public information maintained by grantees of the Department of Housing and Urban Developments Community Development Fund.
